means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 加兰特来源于古法语，含义是“高兴，快乐”(to be in good humour,enjoy oneself)

sentence.Network_en: Douglas was a complex man, thoughtful, gallant, and generous.
sentence.Network_cn: 道格拉斯让人捉摸不透，他体贴周到，对女孩子颇为殷勤，而且慷慨大方。

sentence.Network_en: I had been promoted for what was called gallant and meritorious service.
sentence.Network_cn: 我之所以得到提拔是由于立下了所谓的英勇卓越的功勋。

sentence.Network_en: She made a gallant attempt to hide her tears.

蓝宝词典 ... gall n.v. （使）烦恼；（使）焦躁；难堪 gallant adj. 华丽的；英勇的 galley n. 船上厨房.

list.abs: he was very gallant the ball .他在舞会中对妇女大献殷勤。
These gallant soldiers will protect our country ., 这些勇敢的士兵会保卫我们的国家的.
gallabiya 长袍gallant with 调情gallant 英勇的
They are one of the most gallant peoples in the world ., 他们是世界上最勇敢的民族之一.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'finely dressed'): from Old French galant, from galer 'have fun, make a show', from gale 'pleasure, rejoicing'

entry.def: If someone is gallant, they behave bravely and honourably in a dangerous or difficult situation.

example.ex: The gallant soldiers lost their lives so that peace might reign again.
example.tran: 英勇的战士们为恢复和平献出了生命。

entry.def: A gallant effort or fight is one in which someone tried very hard to do something difficult, although in the end they failed.

example.ex: He died at the age of 82, after a gallant fight against illness.
example.tran: 他在与疾病进行了顽强的抗争后故去，享年82岁。

entry.def: If a man is gallant, he is kind, polite, and considerate towards women.

example.ex: Douglas was a complex man, thoughtful, gallant, and generous.
example.tran: 道格拉斯让人捉摸不透，他体贴周到，对女孩子颇为殷勤，而且慷慨大方。

means.word_mean: 1. a man who is much concerned with his dress and appearance
2. a man who attends or escorts a woman

sentences.sentence: "put up a gallant resistance to the attackers"

means.word_mean: 3. having or displaying great dignity or nobility;
4. having the qualities of gallantry attributed to an ideal knight

auth_sentence.content: He's an exceptionally courteous, gallant gentleman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's an exceptionally courteous, gallant gentleman.

auth_sentence.content: Sir Paul, gallant to the last, has declined.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sir Paul, gallant to the last, has declined.

auth_sentence.content: The gallant Frenchman...pounded into a knockout defeat in four rounds.
auth_sentence.res_content: The gallant Frenchman...pounded into a knockout defeat in four rounds.

means.word_mean: 华丽的，堂皇的, 壮丽的, 雄伟的

sentences.en: Huang Jiguang's gallant deed is known by all men.
sentences.cn: 黄继光的英勇事迹尽人皆知。

jushi.english: Huangjiguang's gallant deed is known by all men.
jushi.chinese: 黄继光的英勇事迹尽人皆知。

jushi.english: He was as ever assiduous and gallant, and called her every day.
jushi.chinese: 他一如既往地献殷勤，每天都给她打电话。
